description: The easiest, juiciest chicken you'll ever make. Try this barbecue chicken marinated in mango and sweet chilli for a superb family lunch or dinner.
keywords: Mango-Glazed Butterflied Chicken With Couscous Salad
name: Mango-Glazed Butterflied Chicken With Couscous Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg Woolworths COOK boneless butterflied chicken in mango & sweet chilli marinade

recipeInstructions.text: Cut chicken into portions and arrange on a platter. Pour over resting juices and serve with couscous salad.
